title: Wealth in the U.S. - UHNW ( super rich ) population in 2014 , by city
summary: This chart shows the Number of Ultra-High-Net-Worth made by State in a super rich .
\\n From the chart we see that the Los_Angeles State was the Wealth U.S. State in the rich with 8655 Ultra-High-Net-Worth .
The next State to make the most Ultra-High-Net-Worth was the Chicago State with 2885 Ultra-High-Net-Worth closely followed by the Seattle State with 1095 Ultra-High-Net-Worth .
gold: This statistic shows the number of the super-rich , or Ultra-High-Net-Worth , persons in the United States in 2014 , sorted by city . New York has the largest concentration of super-rich individuals ; about 8,655 UHNW ( Ultra High Net Worth ) people are living in the metro area .
